description:
"Elias, is an odd failure who pretends to be human -- but is it because of his master`s words, or because of his distrust for humans, that he stopped communicating about himself?
Lindel`s alias, Echoes, refers to the to a song aking to the sound of snowmelt, traveling through the wind, causing the blooming of flowers and the dancing of fairies. The magic of the song turns into a mirror the surface of the water Chise peers into. What does she see beyond the mirror?"
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lovers Ever Run Before the Clock.
